p: Ledesa-Escobar et al. also identified some remarkable flavonoids present in lemon waste extracts obtained by MAE, such as flavanones (hesperidin, eriocitrin or naringin); flavones (diosmin) and flavanols (rutin) [ 45]. In addition, Di Donato et al. also detected hydroxycinnamic acids such as p-coumaric, ferulic and caffeic acids together with flavonoid compounds [ 46].
